Posts.Content: I have taken Femera,& Aromasin cancer pills with bad side affects. They are heavy fatigue,sweats, joint pain , depression, & loss of energy. Is any body out there taken these same pills, & getting any of these side effects? And for how long are you on these pills. Did they finally stop?
Posts.Title: Aromasin & Femera Cancer Pills

Posts.Content: Hi, Fermera& aromasin all gave me the same side effects that you are having. I am getting another set of test taking next week to see how the cancer is . Also, the Dr. took me off my pills till the test are taking. Then I am going for a second Dr. for his advise. I'll let you know how I did. Try something else, for this is not any quality of life. Lots of luck. carmela
Posts.Title: Aromasin & Femera Cancer Pills

Posts.Content: My name is Carmela, I take Zometa once a month. I have tried Fermera, Aromasin I'm on now and amy having the same problem. Heavy fatigue, hot sweats, pain in my joints, Is anyone out there taking something else that does not give those symtoms? I like to take myself off Aromasin for a week and see what I feel like . What do you think. Help.
Posts.Title: my Cancer Traveled to The Bones

Posts.Content: My name is Millie, I have breast cancer, but with no surgury because it was from Harmone therphy. So the Dr. put me on the pill Fermara for 1 1/2 yrs. But I got bad hot sweats, bone 7 joint pain & very tired. So now I am starting to day on Aromasin 25mg. hoping this pill will do better. Also I was on Zometa injection once a month 3mg. for 1 1/2 yrs. Now the Dr. took me off Zometa and only trying Aromasin. So those pains are not from old age it is the medication giving all the disconfort. Because before having this cancer I was fine. I am 72. So tell me out there friends how is Aromasin working for you all? Thank you
Posts.Title: Has Anyone Been on Aromasin and Are They Getting Side Effects?

Posts.Content: This message is for Jennys, you said you were on femera & Amomasin caner pills. well have some difficult in walking, but not as bad as you discribe yours. mime is most fatigue,pain in joints,sweats, and diffucultity in sleeping. Have to take something to sleep at night. The Dr. said the pill Temaxifin does not give you most of the smptoms above. Ask your doctor about that drug.
Posts.Title: Original Breat Cancer-then Spread
